trans-unit.source: Represents the pager row in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
An instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> is created to hold the pager controls in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.INamingContainer> interface is a marker that indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control is part of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Page> object's control hierarchy.
This class is used primarily by control developers.

Control developers can override the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.CreateRow%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.InitializePager%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> class to create a custom pager row.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow"></xref> class.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow.%23ctor%2A> constructor calls the base class constructor, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewRow.%23ctor%2A>, with the specified parameters.

For a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsViewPagerRow> control in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> control, the call is made with `rowIndex` equal to -1, `rowType` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowType.Pager>, and `rowState` equal to <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataControlRowState.Normal>.
The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView.Rows"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView"></xref> control.
